intro.title: Welcome to SafetyHelp
intro.description: Explore our comprehensive tools and resources to enhance occupational health and safety in your workplace.
welcome.title: Welcome to SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Your trusted platform for occupational health and safety (OHS) in South Africa. We provide automated, AI-enhanced tools to ensure safety and compliance for workplaces, schools, churches, and informal sectors. Join our community to access resources, services, and support tailored to your needs.
why_choose.title: Why Choose SafetyHelp for OHS Compliance?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp is your trusted partner for occupational health and safety compliance in South Africa. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools tailored to meet the unique needs of industries like construction, mining, and manufacturing. From generating legal registers to conducting risk assessments, SafetyHelp simplifies complex OHS requirements with user-friendly wizards and real-time support through our AI-powered chatbot. Backed by South African regulations and best practices, we empower businesses to create safer workplaces while ensuring compliance with the OHSA and COIDA. Join thousands of professionals who rely on SafetyHelp to protect their teams and streamline safety processes.
legal_obligations.client.title: Client Obligations
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Prepare a Baseline Risk Assessment (BRA) identifying project hazards.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Provide a Health and Safety Specification outlining specific project requirements.
legal_obligations.client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Accept the Contractor‚Äôs Health and Safety Plan before work begins.
legal_obligations.contractor.title: Contractor Obligations
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Submit a Health and Safety Plan based on the client‚Äôs specification.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Maintain a Health and Safety File on site with all required documentation.
legal_obligations.contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Conduct Risk Assessments and Hazard Identification Risk Assessments (HIRAs) specific to the work.
legal_obligations.professional.title: H&S Professional Obligations
legal_obligations.professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Agents (PrCHSA) manage H&S on behalf of the client, ensuring compliance.
legal_obligations.professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Officers (CHSO) assist contractors in implementing and auditing H&S systems.
legal_obligations.professional.sacpcmp: SACPCMP Guidelines: Must maintain registration and CPD requirements for professional status.

chatbot.response: I'm here to help! For personalized OHS advice, please contact a professional.
construction.title: Construction Health and Safety
construction.description: Ensure compliance with construction health and safety regulations using SafetyHelp OHS Tools. Our resources help you manage risks, comply with legal requirements, and protect workers on-site, drawing from best practices outlined in 'Safety First: The Essentials of OHS Plans.'
legal_appointments.title: Legal Appointments
legal_appointments.description: Manage occupational health and safety legal appointments as required by South African OHS regulations. Use the organogram to assign roles, populate appointee details, and generate a comprehensive document with appointment letters, training records, and more.
organogram.title: OHS Legal Appointments Organogram
organogram.form.name: Appointee Name

organogram.form.phone_error: Please enter a valid phone number (e.g., +27123456789).
legislation.title: Legislation
legislation.description: Access a comprehensive library of OHS legislation, standards, and updates. Generate OHS legal registers, search for specific laws, and explore relationships between regulations. Simplified interpretations are available for purchase to make complex legal texts more accessible.
legislation.tools.title: Legislation Tools
legislation.updates.title: Legislation Updates and Bills
legislation.standards.title: OHS Standards
services.title: SafetyHelp Services
services.description: Discover a range of occupational health and safety services designed to support workplaces, schools, churches, and informal sectors across South Africa. From consulting to training, SafetyHelp provides tailored solutions to ensure compliance and safety.
services.consulting.title: OHS Consulting
services.consulting.description: Get expert advice on OHS compliance, risk management, and legal appointments from our accredited professionals. We‚Äôve worked with organizations like Anglo Platinum, ABSA, and Metrorail to deliver customized solutions.
services.training.title: Training Programs
services.training.description: Access comprehensive training programs for all industries, including construction, manufacturing, and education. Choose from induction training, role-specific courses, and more, all aligned with South African OHS regulations.
services.audits.title: Inspections & Audits
services.audits.description: Ensure your workplace meets OHS standards with our inspection and audit services. Our tools help you conduct thorough checks, generate reports, and implement corrective actions.
services.risk_management.title: Risk Management Plans
services.risk_management.description: Generate tailored risk management plans (RMPs) that cover South African legislation, municipal by-laws, and international standards like ISO 45001, ensuring your business is prepared for any hazard.
services.support.title: Support & Community Tools
services.support.description: Join our community to report incidents, access safety checklists for spaza shops, schools, and taverns, and connect with other OHS professionals for support and collaboration.
training.title: Comprehensive Workplace Training
training.description: Explore our comprehensive workplace training programs to ensure compliance with South African OHS regulations and promote a safe working environment. Choose hands-on training, group training, or use our wizard to get tailored recommendations based on your industry, target audience, and location.

training.manual.purchase.title: Purchase Customizable Training Manual
training.manual.purchase.description: Obtain a comprehensive training manual tailored for your company, including legal requirements, company-specific content based on your risk profile, and quotes from approved training providers.

training.selection_method.title: Select Your Training Method
training.legal_fact.step_1: Legal Fact: OHS Act Section 8 requires employers to provide training tailored to specific workplace hazards.
training.fun_fact.step_2: Fun Fact: Did you know that regular training can reduce workplace incidents by up to 30%?
training.legal_fact.step_3: Legal Fact: Local municipalities may have varying OHS regulations affecting training requirements.
training.fun_fact.step_4: Fun Fact: High-risk workplaces like construction sites require frequent training to maintain safety standards.
training.legal_fact.step_5: Legal Fact: OHS Act mandates specific training for roles like SHE representatives to ensure compliance.

community_tools.description: Report any safety incident or hazard in your community or workplace, from potholes to defective equipment. Use our tools to ensure safety in settings like spaza shops, schools, hospitals, and taverns.
